channel.title: teamwork on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in teamwork on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Growth Is Our Universal Language
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: At Dwarves, the core team live and breathe growth. We believe that growth is our universal language, and we’re always striving to improve ourselves, both personally and professionally.

item.title: Red Flags
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: These red flags are things we don’t want to see in our peeps. Even when you think they are improper, don’t waste your time with a wrong group of people.
